title: Mirror, Mirror
description: Lust's passion will be served; it demands, it militates, it tyrannizes~~Marquis de SadePossession? Obsession? Reincarnation? Or a fifteen year old sadistic psychopath on a killing spree?***Warning - Adult content, sadistic and visually graphic murder scenes where blood is spilled for the sheer pleasure of spilling it, and death is merely a dispassionate objective.
author: Susan Stec
